mapper.update:
UPDATE AC_OPERATOR_FUNC
guid_operator = #{guidOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid_func = #{guidFunc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
guid_app = #{guidApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
guid_funcgroup = #{guidFuncgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
mapper.sql: guid_operator as guidOperator ,guid_func as guidFunc ,auth_type as authType ,start_date as startDate ,end_date as endDate ,guid_app as guidApp ,guid_funcgroup as guidFuncgroup
